info:
Website promoting the DVD releases of all the Star trek franchise as they were released over several years.
The site also included competitions, video clips, quizzes, interactive features, news, and cast interviews.

Mobile app and online version for medical professionals to quickly work out optimal dose and dilution of the drug.
The weight sliders are of particular technical interest as they required some pretty trick scripting to create the effect moving around the point of the indicator.

Web based app to show how broadcasters can choose to render a news story different ways.
Users can flip between clips of reporters presenting the same story, over a choice of green screen background locations.

I have worked on approx. 20 Halifax campaigns.
After the initial build of each campaign the setup would be part automated using node and grunt to help manage the number of variations.
The Hanna Barbara cartoon character were created as sprite sheets per size variation and animated via javascript.

Promotional site for the launch of SEAT SC
Interior and exterior 3D views of the SEAT Leon SC pointing out key features.
Each feature leads to page for more information, of which 5 are bespoke interactive pages.
Frontend development of the brand experience with e-commerce web site. Responsive build using a modular template setup with animated and interactive effects.
Atomic design pattern library of UI components, form page layouts and React demo
